'Dolj' (; originally meant Dol(no)-[[Jiu]], "lower Jiu", toward [[Gorj]] (upper
Jiu)) is a county (judeÅ£) of Romania, in Oltenia, with the capital city at
Craiova (population: 314,437).
categories: Place names of Slavic origin in Romania
